channel.title: CVPR on Yida Wang
channel.description: Recent content in CVPR on Yida Wang

item.title: Learning Local Displacements for Point Cloud Completion
item.description: | paper | code | Abstrarct We propose a novel approach aimed at object and semantic scene completion from a partial scan represented as a 3D point cloud. Our architecture relies on three novel layers that are used successively within an encoder-decoder structure and specifically developed for the task at hand. The first one carries out feature extraction by matching the point features to a set of pre-trained local descriptors. Then, to avoid losing individual descriptors as part of standard operations such as max-pooling, we propose an alternative neighbor-pooling operation that relies on adopting the feature vectors with the highest activations.
